entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 30%
